name: PluggedIN
description:
After roughly 16 drunken hours of work, please enjoy my first game PluggedIN! A shooter where you must stay connected to an outlet to keep shooting! Please leave comments and feedback!

"This is definitely a game" - Abraham Lincoln

"I want my money back and I didn't even pay for it" - Aristotle

"It kinda fits the theme" - Tim Schafer

This game was developed for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam
